comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: Several articles and letters in the Sydney Morning Herald give the date of the unveiling as Thursday 21 February 1929, not Friday 22nd. Read all about it - SMH 22/2/1929 p12 - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/16533398 More images - SMH 22/2/1929 p16 - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/16533131

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/pellethepoet] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Thankyou, I see we are slowly running out of chocolates! The NSW Parliament site also states the ceremony was on the 21 February 1929 - I've updated the caption above. However, the date on the photo in the bottom left corner is 22/2/1929.

AB
